article.content:
table-of-contents ================= end-table-of-contents =====================
This page is for the **Common Workflow Language** [Birds of a Feather](/events/gcc2015/bofs/) meetup being held at [GCC2015](http://gcc2015.tsl.ac.uk/).

**Wednesday, 8 July, 18:00**
**Franklin Room, JICCC**
**Contact: [Michael R. Crusoe](mailto:crusoe@ucdavis.edu)** Who is Participating -------------------- If you are interested, please add your name below and/or send an email to [Michael R. Crusoe](mailto:crusoe@ucdavis.edu). * Michael R. Crusoe * Bjoern Gruening * Helena Rasche Questions? ---------- Send them to [Michael R. Crusoe](mailto:crusoe@ucdavis.edu).
